module.name: slarchive
module.description: SeedLink client for data stream archiving

parameter.name: arclinkAddress
parameter.description: Arclink address (used if proxy functionality is enabled).

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: TCP port that the proxy is running on.

parameter.name: archive
parameter.description: Path to waveform archive where all data is stored. Relative paths (as the default) are treated relative to the installation directory ($SEISCOMP_ROOT).

parameter.name: maxQueuedPerUser
parameter.description: Maximum number of queued requests per user.

parameter.name: maxExecuting
parameter.description: Maximum number of requests executed in parallel.

parameter.name: maxLines
parameter.description: Maximum number of lines per request.

parameter.name: maxAge
parameter.description: Maximum age of request before automatically purged.

parameter.name: localOnly
parameter.description: Disable proxy functionality (use only locally stored data).
